headline: How Verisk’s Cyber Data Tie-Ups and AccuLynx Deal At Verisk Analytics (VRSK) Have Changed Its Investment Story
summary: In early December 2025, Verisk expanded its collaboration with KYND by embedding KYND’s cyber risk intelligence into its Rulebook underwriting platform, while Carpe Data’s fraud detection tools became available through Verisk ClaimSearch to enhance insurers’ cyber risk assessment and injury-claim investigations. Together with the recently announced AccuLynx acquisition and updated guidance after a revenue miss, these partnerships highlight Verisk’s push to deepen its insurance data and...
